comments.body: Added a few cases for `validate` and `validateAt` here.
Added a test for the `message` being a function.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +149,153 @@// tslint:disable-next-line:no-invalid-template-strings
mixed.test("is-jimmy", "${path} is not Jimmy", value => value === "jimmy");
mixed.test(
    "is-jimmy",
    ({ path, value }) => `${path} has an error, it is ${value}`,
